meanings.definition: Make practical and effective use of.
meanings.sent1: I utilise my time wisely by studying every day.
meanings.sent2: She likes to utilise her skills to help others.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel decided to utilise a stick as a tool.
meanings.sent4: He can utilise his charm to win people over effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: In order to succeed, you must utilise every opportunity that comes your way.

meanings.definition: Use or apply in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: The chef will utilise fresh ingredients for the special dish.
meanings.sent2: It is important to utilise the right tools for the job.
meanings.sent3: The detective had to utilise all his skills to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: She can utilise her creativity to come up with innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: To fix the issue, we need to utilise the latest technology available.
